error.message: Sequenza di comandi errata. Risposta del server: This mail server requires authentication when attempting to send to a non-local e-mail address. Please check your mail client settings or contact your administrator to verify that the domain or address is defined for this server.
error.detail: System.Net.Mail.SmtpException: Sequenza di comandi errata. Risposta del server: This mail server requires authentication when attempting to send to a non-local e-mail address.
